name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_116In
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "In" means the element "indium" and "116In" is the isotope "indium-116" with a half-life of 1.64e-04 days.
